- 'Topic-Id': bef8f7655d3f4df7aeeac968781c
  'Description': The intent is to request assistance in finding schools or
    daycare facilities for the employee's children in the new location.

  - 'Id': d4757376d883475c843887e0c449

  - 'Id': 80b101f3d71441fd8ef7ca141c70

      the school.
    'Slot-Example-values':
    - 5 miles
    - 10 miles
    - 15 miles
    - 20 miles
  - 'Id': d7723e36fe2a49629821e29e96da
    'Description': The type of school preferred by the employee.
- 'Topic-Id': 023d7931e80f4a71858ddd95d1b3
  'Description': The intent is to request assistance in obtaining necessary
    visas or work permits for the employee and their family members.
  'Attribute':
  - 'Id': 7e6b7e373d38424ba9ec1e52e671
    'Description': The type of visa required for the employee's relocation.
  - 'Id': ee4d563c363644f78c7cf071f202
    'Description': The destination country where the employee will be relocating.
    'Slot-Example-values':
    - USA
    - Canada
    - UK
    - Australia
    - Germany
  - 'Id': 4f5f773e10784e34b24fb6e2c67c
    'Description': The number and names of family members accompanying the
      employee.
    'Slot-Example-values':
    - spouse
    - child
    - parent
- 'Topic-Id': 76dfa9b2e1bd4cd6a87806cb9a12
  'Description': The employee wants to plan their return to work after parental
    leave.
  'Attribute':
  - 'Id': fa873f1522ce428b959ecde692c9
    'Description': The unique identifier for the employee.
  - 'Id': 995d5b512fb94ba4a49cbad40cc1
    'Description': The date the employee plans to return to work.
  - 'Id': 8733ba3928c340fda7871630501a
    'Description': Whether the employee wants to work part-time upon returning.
  - 'Id': 8008cf56c2bc4688af3a2489c1b5
    'Description': Whether the employee wants flexible working hours upon returning.
    'Slot-Example-values':
    - 'true'
    - 'false'
- 'Topic-Id': 9d1483a2dac64f11b84deeced4be
  'Description': Matches none of the other topics
